title: FS T206 PSA Marquard EPDG and AB 460
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T206 PSA Marquard EPDG and AB 460
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
****Revised for break up and individual pricing****
I am trying to stack some money to see if I can find a Drum HOFer, as the empty spot in the basic backs line bothers me everytime I look.  No regrets on breaking up the big line of HOF backs, but sure wish I had at least kept the basic line intact.

I am now pricing the two remaining as individual cards

PSA 4 Hands At Thighs EPDG back $425
PSA 4 Follow Through American Beauty 460 back $400

PSA 3 Portrait Cycle 350 back  SOLDD

I would also consider trades for an American Beauty Eddie Collins, or beater HOFers with tougher backs!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Hope all is well,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Hello all,
Just a bump for breaking up the lot.  The Cycle was a key card in finishing off one transaction with another group of cards, so I had to break them up.  These two PSA 4's left.
Thanks for the time,
Bob
